column1: Uchi////Girlfriend tried the Anago (Sea Eel) and was in love! She said it had the perfect crisp sear. I didn't care for the Katsuo Bonito or the Masu (Ocean Trout)... The Masu was very similar to the Salmon Belly we ordered
column2: so it wasn't really worth it or special. Sushi Chef threw in a special torched rockfish for us that was really good as well.
